You don't have enough BNB for gas to com: You don't have enough BNB for gas to complete the transaction
reward-plan-bonus-1: Earn 5% of your referrals rewards if number (owned zepoch + referred zepoch ) >= 5
reward-plan-bonus-2: Earn 15% of your referrals refers’ rewards if number (owned zepoch + referred zepoch ) >= 15
reward-plan-desc: ZBC rewards will be vested in 24 month. You can withdraw every second.
Draw Pool Desc: Three winners are drawn from the participants for every 500 Zepoch Nodes sold.
treasury-tooltip-desc: Upon the purchase of Zepoch Node NFT, the contract will automatically allocate 3% of the funds towards investing in the Horizon Treasury.
treasury-desc: If no new node is sold within 24 hours, 20% of the total bonus rewards will be awarded to the last node participant, and 80% will be equally distributed to the last 2-100 participants.
Build Zebec Chain, Earn Points: Build the Zebec Chain, Earn Points
intro: Welcome to Operation Horizon, Zebec’s campaign to launch a high-throughput, payment-focused Layer 3 Blockchain. Zebec’s amazing community will be at the core of this operation and will help bootstrap the network through the Zepoch Nodes.
ZebecIntro: Participating in Operation Horizon will help us expand Zebec Protocol and revolutionize payments in Web2 and Web3. By participating in Operation Horizon, you will passively earn token rewards and have access to exclusive privileges.
HoldersBenefit: A Zepoch Node NFT serves as your proof of identity, granting you the ability to start earning $ZBC rewards immediately after purchase and enabling you to operate a validator node when Zebec Chain goes live.
HonorHolders: Themis Gavel is a soul-bound NFT that uses the EIP-5114 Standard and is used for governance purposes as well as to interact with the Zebec DAO.
ZebecPointIntro: Zebec Points incentivize community contribution to develop Zebec’s ecosystem. Zebec Points will reward holders for referring users and participating in Zebec’s ecosystem. The more Zebec Points a Zebec community member has, the more tokens you will receive in Operation Horizon.
Please check the box for the risk agreem: Please check the box for the risk agreement
max transaction alert: A maximum of {{limit}} Nodes can be acquired in a single transaction
Get a Zepoch NFT and Start Earning: Get Zepoch Node and Start Earning
pointsExplanation: Zebec Points are a voucher system designed to reward those who buy Zepoch Node NFT’s or refer others to purchase them. The more Zebec Points you have, the bigger rewards you will receive from Zebec airdrops. Zebec Points measure contributions to the community in order to incentivize Zebec ecosystem’s growth.
rankListTip: The points leaderboard updates every 15 minutes.
earnedDesc: Top of the leaderboard will receive bonus Zebec Points.
Invite your friends to earn exclusive re: Invite your friends to earn exclusive rewards
participate-to-activate: Please participate in the Zebec Operation Horizon to activate the referral system
100 Million ZBC Giveaway for Zepoch Supp: 100 Million $ZBC Giveaway for Zepoch Node NFT Supporters
Hold and Earn up to 100% APY: Hold and Earn up to 100% APY
farm-claimable-rewards-tooltip: The rewards will be linearly unlocked in 180 days
Stake LP token to earn: Stake ZBC-USDT LP token to earn
register-warning: Please register your account by purchasing the Zepoch Node
